story.text: (Corrects that DaimlerChrysler U.S. sales fell 1 percent in December, not Chrysler Group sales)DETROIT Jan 3 (Reuters) - DaimlerChrysler AGDCXGn.DE on Wednesday said U.S. vehicle sales fell 1 percent in December. Chrysler Group, which includes the Chrysler, Jeep and Dodge brands, said its sales rose 1 percent, while Mercedes-Benz sales fell 10 percent compared with a year earlier, the company said.
story.title: corrected - daimlerchrysler ' s u . s . december sales down 1 pct
